# Preface {-}

This is a book about Tercen. It is currently a draft and aims to eventually be the definitive guide to Tercen. It is incrementally written and changes often.  

<center>![](images/tercen-book.png)</center>


## Why read this book? {-}

It is the centralized knowledge of Tercen in a book format. It is intended to be detailed and is aimed for researchers who require a broader and deeper understanding of Tercen. If you require to have a quick intro  to Tercen without the details then we suggest the [starters guide](https://tercen.github.io/starters-guide/). 

## Structure of the book {-}

The book has a chapter for each main feature of the tool. The final chapters contain additional practical information (e.g. server configuration, roadmaps, etc.)

## Acknowledgement {-}

We would like to thank all the users for their feedback about Tercen. It has helped us improve Tercen.

## Feedback {-}

If you wish to give feedback then please do not hesitate to create an entry in the [issue tracker](https://github.com/tercen/tercen-book/issues).
